scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k "pnpm --filter import-map-app2 run build" "pnpm --filter import-map-app1 run build" "pnpm --filter import-map-app2 run serve" "pnpm --filter import-map-app1 run serve" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3102/remoteEntry.js http://127.0.0.1:3101 && pnpm --filter import-map-app1 run e2e"
